subject: Hazing
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Jenny Haigh, the Northwestern women's coach, resigned yesterday after her team was recently reprimanded for hazing. Northwestern reinstated its women's program earlier this month after suspending it May 15, the day photographs of the hazing incident appeared on a Web site. Several players are on disciplinary probation, and the team is required to perform community service. Some players will also be suspended from regular-season games next season, Athletic Director Mark Murphy said.
